message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase a unique product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $1100000.
I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand you're looking to save some money, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. I can offer it to you for $1000000. This is my best price, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm not willing to go as low as $950000, but I'm willing to make another concession. I can offer it to you for $980000. This is my best price, and I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we might not be able to come to an agreement.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $970000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close, but I'm still not willing to meet your price. I can offer it to you for $990000. This is my final concession, and I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $990000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $980000. Can you consider this offer?

I'm surprised you're trying to negotiate again after I made it clear that $990000 was my final price. However, I'm willing to give you one last chance. I can offer it to you for $995000, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not willing to pay $995000. I'm willing to meet you at $985000, but I'm not sure if it's worth it. Can you consider this offer?
